events.name: Blockchain Consulting 101 with EY & Deloitte
events.description: This Monday, 9/11, we’re exploring how modern business problems might require blockchain-based and decentralized solutions! We’re fortunate to have Adarsh Ramesh Nair from Deloitte’s Blockchain & Digital Assets team, and KC Pyon, a Senior Manager from EY’s Digital Assets team, to speak about their experiences and perspectives within the web3 industry.

events.name: Mentorship and Team Applications Drop
events.description: This could be you if you apply..., choice is yours.
